item.title: Trump Demands Powell to Cut Interest Rates
item.description: July 25th: During a visit to the headquarters of the Federal Reserve, U.S. President Trump participated in a media interview with Federal Reserve Chairman Powell. Regarding how he would retract his criticism of Powell, Trump expressed his hope for a rate cut and stated that he would pay attention to the Committee's rate decision.Trump also said, "In general, I would fire a project manager who exceeds the budget." As Trump referred to the renovation budget data of the Federal Reserve headquarters, Powell kept shaking his head nearby. Trump also made a sarcastic remark that the building renovation was a challenging task.After Trump said to Powell, "I want him to lower the interest rates," he forcefully patted Powell on the back, and then Powell awkwardly laughed. (FXStreet)

item.title: Trump: Firing Powell Would Be a Big Deal But Not Necessary
item.description: On July 25th, the President of the United States, Trump, stated that he had a fruitful discussion with Powell regarding the issue of interest rates, and the atmosphere was not strained. Removing Powell would be a significant action but not an inevitable one. (FXStreet)

item.title: RESOLV Short-term Surge of Over 11%, Market Cap Rises to $47 Million
item.description: On July 25th, perhaps due to the news that "Resolv announced the activation of the protocol fee switch to reward RESOLV stakers," RESOLV witnessed a short-term surge of more than 11%, with a market valuation reaching $47 million.

item.title: 「Mahjong Brother」 Huang Licheng's total floating loss on long positions narrowed to $5.43 million
item.description: On July 25th, based on on-chain data, "Whale Buddy" Huang Licheng currently holds a long position worth $138.94 million on Hyperliquid, which includes ETH, HYPE, and PUMP. Currently, the ETH long position is in a floating profit state, while HYPE and PUMP are still in a loss. The total floating loss has now been reduced to $5.43 million (excluding the already lost funding rate), which was once at a floating loss of more than $8 million.

item.title: Resolv Announces Activation of Protocol Fee Switch to Reward RESOLV Stakers
item.description: On July 25th, the DeFi protocol Resolv announced in a post that starting from this month, Resolv will commence accruing protocol fees. It will utilize a portion of the daily profits for long-term value creation and the benefit of RESOLV stakers.The protocol fees will gradually be activated starting this month. The fee escalation plan is as follows:Week 1 → 2.5% of daily profitsWeek 2 → 5.0%Week 3 → 7.5%Week 4 and onwards → 10.0%Protocol fees will only be collected when positive revenue is generated. On days with zero or negative revenue, no fees will be charged. This is a performance-based system where revenue is shared when the protocol is profitable and no fees are imposed when it is not. This is not a reduction in earnings but a shift from 100% user payment to a shared growth model, activating the RESOLV flywheel.

item.title: Trump Ally Sues Powell, Calls for FOMC Meeting Transparency
item.description: July 25th: A firm with the backing of supporters of U.S. President Trump has initiated a lawsuit against Federal Reserve Chairman Powell and other Fed officials, demanding that the Fed conduct its monetary policy meetings in an open manner. The U.S. investor James Fishback's company, Azoria Capital, stated in a lawsuit filed on Thursday that the FOMC's long-standing practice of holding closed-door meetings was in violation of government transparency laws.The fund filed the lawsuit with a federal court in Washington and demanded that the Fed hold an open meeting from July 29th to 30th. The company noted in the lawsuit: "Azoria is highly concerned that under Powell's leadership, the FOMC has maintained high interest rates, which has had a negative impact on President Trump and his economic agenda, and has also damaged U.S. citizens and the U.S. economy." (FX678)

item.title: Tether Mints Additional 1 Billion USDT
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Whale Alert, Tether minted 1 billion USDT on the Ethereum network 3 minutes ago. Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino stated that this was an authorized but not yet issued transaction. It will be used as inventory for the next issuance request and for on-chain exchanges.

item.title: Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has transferred approximately $140 million worth of XRP to a trading platform in the past 7 days
item.description: On July 25th, according to The Block, on-chain analyst ZachXBT pointed out that starting from July 17th, a wallet that has long been associated with Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has transferred 50 million XRP. This wallet seems to have sent approximately $140 million worth of tokens to three addresses related to exchanges. Meanwhile, another 10 million XRP has been deposited into two newly created wallets. The address under the control of Chris Larsen still holds around 2.81 billion XRP, which is approximately worth $9 billion.Previously, the SEC accused Ripple's CEO Brad Garlinghouse of personally converting $150 million worth of XRP within three years when it sued Ripple in 2020. The SEC also stated that Larsen and his spouse sold $450 million worth of tokens between 2017 and 2020.

item.title: Institutional Ethereum Whale Holdings Change in the Last 30 Days: Bitmine Reclaims Top Spot with 566,800 ETH
item.description: On July 25th, based on the data from Strategicethreserve, the following treasury companies and institutions with significant changes in Ethereum holdings within the past 30 days are as follows:Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) takes the first place. It currently holds 566,800 ETH, which is approximately worth $21.1 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 247.41%.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) ranks second. It currently holds 360,800 ETH, approximately worth $13.5 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 91.43%.The Ethereum Foundation ranks third. It holds 237,500 ETH, approximately worth $8.86 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have decreased by 8.09%.Bit Digital (BTBT) ranks seventh. It holds 120,300 ETH, approximately worth $4.487 billion. In the past 30 days, its holdings have increased by 335.53%.BTCS Inc (BTCS) ranks eleventh. item.title: Kalshi is partnering with x.ai to bring Grok to the prediction market.
item.description: On July 25th, Kalshi entered into a partnership with xAI to incorporate Grok into the prediction market.
